name: Pomodoro.spoon
description: A simple Pomodoro timer for Hammerspoon
author: Jiho Hwang <jito.hello@gmail.com>

start.description: Starts the Pomodoro Spoon and initializes the menubar

stop.description: Stops the Pomodoro Spoon and cleans up resources

parameters.mapping: Table containing hotkey modifier/key details for start, stop, and toggle

toggleSession.description: Toggles between starting and stopping a Pomodoro session

getStatistics.returns: Table with today and all daily statistics

constants.name: WORK_DURATION
constants.description: Work session duration in seconds (25 minutes)

notes: Statistics are stored in hs.settings with the key 'pomodoro.stats'
The menubar displays a tomato emoji (üçÖ) during work and coffee emoji (‚òï) during breaks

usage_examples.title: Basic usage
usage_examples.description: Load and start the Pomodoro Spoon

usage_examples.title: With hotkeys
Manual control
usage_examples.code:
-- Start a session
spoon.Pomodoro:startSession()

-- Stop current session
spoon.Pomodoro:stopSession()

-- Toggle session
spoon.Pomodoro:toggleSession()

usage_examples.title: Get statistics
usage_examples.code:
local stats = spoon.Pomodoro:getStatistics()
print("Today's sessions:", stats.today)
